## About

Prof. Karen Duff is the Director of the UK Dementia Research Institute at UCL. Her research focuses on translational aspects of Alzheimer's disease, particularly understanding and targeting the disease cascade.

## Research Interests

- AD pathogenesis cascade
- Therapeutic development
- Translational research
- Disease mechanisms
